# Network TCP

Implements the @xyo-network/network interfaces for sending and receiving messages between nodes over TCP

## Install

Using yarn

```sh
  yarn add @xyo-network/network.tcp
```

Using npm

```sh
  npm install @xyo-network/network.tcp --save
```
